title: BRIMAX B15 LED Filament Candle Bulbs, C35 4W Small Bayonet Light Bulb, C35 Clear Glass Bulb, AC220-240V, Equivalent to 40W, 2700K Soft Warm White Dimmable Candelabra Bulb, 5 Pack
features: Warm Tips：Please kindly check the BULB CAP before your purchase. These bulbs are b15 small bayonet cap. NOT B22.

【Full Specification】BRIMAX C35 filament led candle bulb, AC220-240V, dimmable, 4watt, 40watt incandescent bulb equivalent, B15 base, 2700k soft warm white. Made of premium quality clear glass, vintage candle shape, good transparency, color uniformity, strong and durable, excellent heat dissipation performance, improve service life.

【2700K Soft Warm White】4W LED Edison light bulb emit 2700K soft white lighting, nice brightness (not too harsh), produce a nice warm lighting ambiance, perfect for chandelier light. Great for living rooms and bedrooms where you would want to promote relaxation.

【Energy Efficient B15 Led Candle Bulbs】This c35 4W led filament bulb consumes just 4 Watts, equivalent to 40 watts incandescent bulbs, Led filament technology, cost only 10% energy but works 10 times long to old incandescent bulbs. This bayonet light bulb can save over 90% on electricity bill on lighting.

【Dimmable B15 Small Bayonet Bulbs】 These small bayonet candle light bulbs are dimmable, no flicker or strobe, using dimmer can adjust brightness to different level of 10%-100% range. BRIMAX led bulbs are compatible with most led dimmers, such as V-PRO LED dimmer switch and LED Trailing Edge Dimmer Switch, but not compatible with incandescent and halogen dimmers.

【Wide Application】Dimmable bayonet light bulb with b15 small bayonet cap, easy to install, ideal for indoor decoration: chandelier light, ceiling fans, wall sconces, pendant light, living room, dining room, restaurant, coffee shop, hotel, desk lamp, mason jar light fixture, bathroom light fixtures, or other light fitting with b15 socket etc.
description: Product Description BRIMAX C35 B15 Small Bayonet Dimmable LED Light Bulbs Dimmable: These led b15 candle bulbs are dimmable, you can adjust the brightness as you like, but please make sure to choose the right dimmer to avoid flickering.Please do not use incandescent and halogen dimmers. C35 bayonet light bulbs are compatible with most led dimmers. Previous page 2700K Warm white 4W LED Edison light bulbs emit 2700K warm white lighting, produce a nice warm lighting ambiance. Omnidirectional This C35 B15 led bulb offers 360° distribution of light, creating a gorgeous illuminating effect. Protect Your Eyes No flicker or strobe, no infrared or ultraviolet radiation, more uniform and soft on the eyes. Next page BRIMAX C35 4W LED Light Bulbs, Dimmable, B15 Small Bayonet Cap LED Filament Bulb 1 Dimmable 2 High CRI 3 2700K LED Light Bulb 4 360° Beam Aangle 5 No flicker Please kindly check the BULB CAP before your purchase. These bulbs are b15 small bayonet cap. NOT B22. Specifications of C35 B15 Bayonet Light Bulb C35 4W LED Filament Bulb, B15 Dimmable LED Candle Bulbs Energy Efficient B15 Bayonet Light Bulb High efficiency This C35 B15 dimmable led candle bulb consumes just 4 Watts, emitting 400 lumen of light, equivalent to 40 watts incandescent bulbs and saving over 90% on electricity bill on lighting. Driven by a unique circuit control design, built-in constant current drive power supply, to ensure stable performance of lamps and lanterns, and truly achieve high efficiency and energy saving, power saving up to more than 90%. Easy Installation Easy to install and can be easily fitted The bulb body is designed with high quality filament LED strips and clear glass shell which makes the b15 bayonet led light bulb much better at resisting the heat. These small bayonet light bulbs with B15 base are easy to easy to push in and turn on. Wide Application C35 Small Bayonet Candle Bulbs Previous page Chandelier LED Light Learn More Ceiling Fan Learn More Table Lamp Learn More Wall Sconce Learn More Floor Lamp Learn More Other LED Lighting Fixture with B15 Socket Ideal for illuminating homes, perfect for use in kitchens, offices, workplaces, living rooms, restaurant, coffee shop, hotel, mood lighting, general lighting, bedrooms. Learn More Next page BRIMAX B15 small bayonet candle bulbs 4w, ideal for creating a romantic and cozy atmosphere, soft on your eyes, producing a relaxing warm radiance full glow.
